verblex: 1. [Usually with lip pouting] of an accident or disaster, to very nearly happen. Idiomatic English = (be) a close shave, (be) a close call, (be) very close.
interj: 1. [Usually with lip pouting] used alone to express your perception that an accident or disaster very nearly happened. English = 'That was close!', 'That was a close shave!', 'That was a close call!'
nomlex: 1. [Usually with lip pouting] an event in which something bad, such as an accident or disaster, very nearly happened. Idiomatic English = close shave, close call.
